Spells cost 35% mana less to cast.
To brew any healing potions or potions to strengthen magic power, you need a proper mixture of plants:
healing plants and fire plants, combined with Forest Berry for small and Blue Elder for medium potions.
Stronger potions call for Meadow Knotweed.
To brew any potions that effect permanent changes to the body or spirit, you need two plants:
Brewing these recipes is the highest art of alchemy. They all have the use of king's sorrel and meadow knotweed as an ingredients in common.
